data.message: I just saw a thing on my feed where you guys will send griend requests to people in my phone book when they get Facebook accounts. If it's real, could you please stop it? I dont need help sending friend requests. And just because someone's number is in my phone doesnt mean i want to be FB friends with them. Thanks.

replies.message: Hi, Kelly. When you upload your contacts to Facebook, you can choose to send your contacts an invitation to join Facebook. If people received an invitation from you that you didn't mean to send, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2jRabd4. -Rhea
I think I fixed it. I removed Facebook from the "Accounts and Sync" on my phone (I dunno how that happened). 😮
Certain apps have "permissions " that may of have allowed them to change the setting Kelly Dean Finley
